You are my daughter's son, that is, you are my own grandson. Having determined that I shall obtain some real estate from you out of my love and affection for you and in order to obtain some real estate from you, I hereby grant you the following property, which is mentioned in the third paragraph below, and which has been inherited by me and has been in my full and exclusive possession and cultivation right up to this day, with all the rights I have in the property, which no one else has any right to, and which is mentioned in the third paragraph below, the value of the property, which is the Scheduled Property, which is mentioned in the third paragraph, is Rs. 7,00,000/- in words, and is valued at seven lakh rupees, out of my love and affection for you, and I hereby grant you the property free of charge and take possession of it immediately. From now on, you shall pay the taxes due on the property, get it registered in your name in the government records, build a house, etc., and enjoy it freely and comfortably, with full rights to sell, borrow, donate, and sell it to your children and grandchildren as you wish. The property has not been mortgaged, sold, or otherwise transferred to anyone before. Neither I nor my heirs have ever had to deal with any disputes or charges regarding the property as per the Schedule. If such things arise, I will be able to settle them all on my own responsibility and make the Schedule Gift Settlement property available to you without any problems. III. reportJson.addressLine: located near by house number 9-38-63 (Old) or 9-38-74/1

sections.content: The property covered under Gift Settlement Deed No. 2185 of 2010, dated 03/Aug/2010, executed by Chintapalli Adinarayana in favour of his Grand-Son, Kaja Ashok Kumar towards the property admeasuring an extent of 104 Sq. Yds, located near by house number 9-38-63 (Old) or 9-38-74/1, comprised in survey number 112, Ward No. 15, Block 38, Assessment No. 1089003223, situated in Sangivalasa Village, , Bheemunipatnam Municipality and Mandal, within the District of Visakhapatnam, registered at sub-registrar office Bheemunipatnam, is bounded as follows: North by: Vacant Site of Chintapalli Srinivasa Rao South by: C.C Road East by: Vacant Site of Chintapalli Narasimhalu ETC West by: ACC House of Vallasetty Krishna
It is noted from the given documents and EC that the schedule property is not part of any active Mortgage or Lease Deed.

Note: It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
